You are creating %f kg of CO2 from driving. Try using transit.
Driving is creating %f kg of CO2 emissions. Try car pooling.
Your car trips are generating %f kg of CO2. Try getting an electric car.
Driving is creating %f kg of CO2. Consider using cruise control.
You are generating %f kg of CO2 from driving. Remember to remove excess weight from your car.
%f kg of CO2 is generated from your driving. Combine errands to make fewer trips.
You are creating %f kg of CO2 from driving. Consider getting a fuel efficient car.
Driving is creating %f kg of CO2. Consider walking or riding a bike.
Your electricity consumption is making %f of CO2, try unplugging unused electronic devices
You are making %f kg of CO2 from electricity, try shutting off lights when not in use and Consider taking shorter showers.
Your electricity usage is making %f kg of CO2, try installing solar panels.
Your energy bill is creating %f kg of CO2. Consider putting your computers in sleep mode when they\'re not in use.
Your energy bill is generating %f kg of CO2. Try washing your laundry in cold water, and Remember to change air filters frequently.
%f kg of CO2 is created from your electricity bill. Consider switching to LED lightbulbs.
Your energy consumption is generating %f kg of CO2. Try using your microwave over your oven when possible.
%f of CO2 emissions come from your energy bill. Consider managing your thermostat.Try using your heater less often.

You drove %d times car so far, When possible, walk or ride your bike in order to avoid carbon emissions completely. Carpooling and public transportation drastically reduce CO2 emissions by spreading them out over many riders.
You produce %f from home application A better concept is probably ‘embodied energy’, which takes account of all the carbon, water and energy that goes into producing any food or manufactured item.

Drive a low carbon vehicle. You drove %d in HWY and city, High mileage doesn’t always mean low CO2 emissions. All vehicles have an estimated miles-per-gallon rating. Electric cars emit no CO2 if they’re charged with clean electricity.
Get a hitch-mounted cargo rack. Don’t buy a minivan or SUV if you don’t need 4WD and/or will only occasionally need the extra space. Since you drove SUV %d times
You drove %d KM on highway,Speeding and unnecessary acceleration reduce mileage by up to 33%, waste gas and money, and increase your carbon footprint.
Insulate and seal your home. You produced %f CO2 from home, Reduce drafts and air leaks with caulk, insulation, and weather stripping.
You drove %d KM on city,Being stuck in traffic wastes gas and unneccessarily creates CO2. Use traffic websites and apps and go a different way or wait.
You have used Bus and Skytrain as your daily transportation %d times! Keep it up!
